### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE FitnessGoals ( goal_id INT PRIMARY KEY, goal_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, description TEXT, target_duration INT )
CREATE TABLE ExercisePlans ( plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY, plan_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, goal_id INT REFERENCES FitnessGoals(goal_id), start_date DATE, end_date DATE )
CREATE TABLE Exercises ( exercise_id INT PRIMARY KEY, exercise_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, description TEXT, equipment_needed VARCHAR(100), calories_burned_per_hour INT )
CREATE TABLE Workouts ( workout_id INT PRIMARY KEY, workout_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, plan_id INT REFERENCES ExercisePlans(plan_id), exercise_id INT REFERENCES Exercises(exercise_id), repetitions INT, duration_minutes INT )
CREATE TABLE Users ( user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, date_of_birth DATE )

### STATEMENT

UPDATE FitnessGoals SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE goal_id = 1;
